verses.verse: וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become צַעֲקַ֥ת <S%H6818><s%> tza-'a-Kat cry הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people וּנְשֵׁיהֶ֖ם <S%H802><s%> u-ne-shei-Hem and of their wives גְּדוֹלָ֑ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah; And there was a great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- against אֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem against their brethren הַיְּהוּדִֽים׃ <S%H3064><s%> hai-ye-hu-Dim. the Jews

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> ve-Yesh For there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, that said בָּנֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-nu We our sons וּבְנֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-nu and our daughters אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; [are] many וְנִקְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> ve-nik-Chah therefore we take up דָגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> da-Gan corn וְנֹאכְלָ֥ה <S%H398><s%> ve-no-che-Lah [for them] that we may eat וְנִחְיֶֽה׃ <S%H2421><s%> ve-nich-Yeh. and live

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> ve-Yesh [Some] also there were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, that said שְׂדֹתֵ֛ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> se-do-Tei-nu our lands וּכְרָמֵ֥ינוּ <S%H3754><s%> u-che-ra-Mei-nu vineyards וּבָתֵּ֖ינוּ <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-Tei-nu and houses אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we עֹרְבִ֑ים <S%H6148><s%> 'o-re-Vim; We have mortgaged וְנִקְחָ֥ה <S%H3947><s%> ve-nik-Chah that we might buy דָגָ֖ן <S%H1715><s%> da-Gan corn בָּרָעָֽב׃ <S%H7458><s%> ba-ra-'Av. because of the dearth

וְיֵשׁ֙ <S%H3426><s%> ve-Yesh There were אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> 'o-me-Rim, also that said לָוִ֥ינוּ <S%H3867><s%> la-Vi-nu We have borrowed כֶ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Che-sef money לְמִדַּ֣ת <S%H4060><s%> le-mid-Dat tribute הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech; for the king's שְׂדֹתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> se-do-Tei-nu [and that upon] our lands וּכְרָמֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H3754><s%> u-che-ra-Mei-nu. and vineyards

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now כִּבְשַׂ֤ר <S%H1320><s%> kiv-Sar Yet now our flesh אַחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-nu of our brethren בְּשָׂרֵ֔נוּ <S%H1320><s%> be-sa-Re-nu, [is] as the flesh כִּבְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H1121><s%> kiv-nei-Hem our children בָּנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-nu; as their children וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we כֹ֠בְשִׁים <S%H3533><s%> Choe-shim and lo we bring into bondage אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בָּנֵ֨ינוּ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-nu our sons וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בְּנֹתֵ֜ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> be-no-Tei-nu and our daughters לַעֲבָדִ֗ים <S%H5650><s%> la-'a-va-Dim, to be servants וְיֵ֨שׁ <S%H3426><s%> ve-Yesh are מִבְּנֹתֵ֤ינוּ <S%H1323><s%> mib-be-no-Tei-nu and [some] of our daughters נִכְבָּשׁוֹת֙ <S%H3533><s%> nich-ba-shOt brought unto bondage וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein else לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> le-'El God יָדֵ֔נוּ <S%H3027><s%> ya-De-nu, because וּשְׂדֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H7704><s%> u-se-do-Tei-nu have our lands וּכְרָמֵ֖ינוּ <S%H3754><s%> u-che-ra-Mei-nu and vineyards לַאֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> la-'a-che-Rim. [to redeem them] for other men

וַיִּ֥חַר <S%H2734><s%> vai-Yi-char angry לִ֖י li מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od; And I was very כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher I שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> sha-Ma'-ti when I heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זַֽעֲקָתָ֔ם <S%H2201><s%> za-'a-ka-Tam, their cry וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim and these words הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. and these

וַיִּמָּלֵ֨ךְ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yim-ma-Lech Then I consulted לִבִּ֜י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi with myself עָלַ֗י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai, against וָאָרִ֙יבָה֙ <S%H7378><s%> va-'a-Ri-vah and I rebuked אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֹרִ֣ים <S%H2715><s%> ha-cho-Rim the nobles וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַסְּגָנִ֔ים <S%H5461><s%> has-se-ga-Nim, and the rulers וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah and said לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, מַשָּׁ֥א <S%H5378><s%> mash-Sha debt אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- every one בְּאָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> be-'a-Chiv of his brother אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you נֹשִׁ֑אים <S%H5383><s%> no-Shim; creditor וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-Ten And I set עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem against קְהִלָּ֥ה <S%H6952><s%> ke-hil-Lah assembly גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. a great

וָאֹמְרָ֣ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah And I said לָהֶ֗ם la-Hem, אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Nach-nu we קָ֠נִינוּ <S%H7069><s%> Ka-ni-nu have redeemed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַחֵ֨ינוּ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-nu our brethren הַיְּהוּדִ֜ים <S%H3064><s%> hai-ye-hu-Dim the Jews הַנִּמְכָּרִ֤ים <S%H4376><s%> han-nim-ka-Rim which were sold לַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> lag-go-Yim unto the heathen כְּדֵ֣י <S%H1767><s%> ke-Dei unto them We after our ability בָ֔נוּ Va-nu, וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- even אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you תִּמְכְּר֥וּ <S%H4376><s%> tim-ke-Ru and will ye even sell אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲחֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Chem your brothers וְנִמְכְּרוּ־ <S%H4376><s%> ve-nim-ke-ru- may be sold לָ֑נוּ La-nu; וַֽיַּחֲרִ֔ישׁוּ <S%H2790><s%> vai-ya-cha-Ri-shu, unto us;Then held they their peace וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not מָצְא֖וּ <S%H4672><s%> ma-tze-'U and found דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> da-Var. answer ס sa-Mek

וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹומַ֕ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar answer קלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov It [is] not good הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var that אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you עֹשִׂ֑ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim; ye do הֲל֞וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not בְּיִרְאַ֤ת <S%H3374><s%> be-yir-'At in the fear אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu of our God תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <S%H1980><s%> te-Le-chu, walk מֵחֶרְפַּ֖ת <S%H2781><s%> me-cher-Pat because of the reproach הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the heathen אוֹיְבֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H341><s%> 'oy-Vei-nu. our enemies

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and likewise אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אַחַ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chai I likewise [and] my brethren וּנְעָרַ֔י <S%H5288><s%> u-ne-'a-Rai, and my servants נֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H5383><s%> no-Shim might exact בָּהֶ֖ם ba-Hem כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> Ke-sef of them money וְדָגָ֑ן <S%H1715><s%> ve-da-Gan; and corn נַֽעַזְבָה־ <S%H5800><s%> na-'az-vah- I pray you let us leave off נָּ֖א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמַּשָּׁ֥א <S%H4855><s%> ham-mash-Sha this usury הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. this

הָשִׁיבוּ֩ <S%H7725><s%> ha-shi-Vu Restore נָ֨א <S%H4994><s%> na Please לָהֶ֜ם la-Hem כְּהַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ke-hai-Yom, I pray you to them even this day שְׂדֹתֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H7704><s%> se-do-tei-Hem their lands כַּרְמֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H3754><s%> kar-mei-Hem their vineyards זֵיתֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H2132><s%> zei-tei-Hem their oliveyards וּבָתֵּיהֶ֑ם <S%H1004><s%> u-vat-tei-Hem; and their houses וּמְאַ֨ת <S%H3967><s%> u-me-'At also the hundredth הַכֶּ֤סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef [part] of the money וְהַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> ve-had-da-Gan and of the corn הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> hat-ti-Roosh the wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> ve-hai-yitz-Har, and the oil אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you נֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H5383><s%> no-Shim that ye exact בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru Then said נָשִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> na-Shiv, they We will restore וּמֵהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> u-me-Hem like לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nothing נְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> ne-vak-Kesh, [them] and will require כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken exactly נַעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> na-'a-Seh, nothing of them so will we do כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you אוֹמֵ֑ר <S%H559><s%> o-Mer; as thou sayest וָאֶקְרָא֙ <S%H7121><s%> va-'ek-Ra Then I called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-Ko-ha-Nim, the priests וָֽאַשְׁבִּיעֵ֔ם <S%H7650><s%> va-'ash-bi-'Em, and took an oath לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot of them that they should do כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also חָצְנִ֣י <S%H2684><s%> cha-tze-Ni my lap נָעַ֗רְתִּי <S%H5287><s%> na-'Ar-ti, Also I shook וָֽאֹמְרָ֡ה <S%H559><s%> va-'o-me-Rah and said כָּ֣כָה <S%H3602><s%> Ka-chah Thus יְנַעֵ֪ר <S%H5287><s%> ye-na-'Er shake out הָֽאֱלֹהִ֟ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him So God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every הָאִישׁ֩ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish every man אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- does not יָקִ֜ים <S%H6965><s%> ya-Kim that performeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var not this promise הַזֶּ֗ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, this מִבֵּיתוֹ֙ <S%H1004><s%> mib-bei-To from his house וּמִ֣יגִיע֔וֹ <S%H3018><s%> u-Mi-gi-'O, and from his labour וְכָ֛כָה <S%H3602><s%> ve-Cha-chah thus יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh become נָע֖וּר <S%H5287><s%> na-'Ur even thus be he shaken out וָרֵ֑ק <S%H7386><s%> va-Rek; and emptied וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol and all הַקָּהָ֜ל <S%H6951><s%> hak-ka-Hal And all the congregation אָמֵ֗ן <S%H543><s%> 'a-Men, Amen וַֽיְהַלְלוּ֙ <S%H1984><s%> vay-hal-Lu and praised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as did הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am And the people כַּדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> kad-da-Var according to this promise הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh. to this

גַּ֞ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Moreover מִיּ֣וֹם׀ <S%H3117><s%> mi-Yom Moreover from the time אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- i צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah that I was appointed אֹתִ֗י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti, לִהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become פֶּחָם֮ <S%H6346><s%> pe-Cham to be their governor בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land יְהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah of Judah מִשְּׁנַ֣ת <S%H8141><s%> mish-she-Nat year עֶשְׂרִ֗ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim, from the twentieth וְ֠עַד <S%H5704><s%> Ve-'ad against שְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> she-Nat year שְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> she-lo-Shim and thirtieth וּשְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Ta-yim even unto the two לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֣סְתְּא <S%H783><s%> le-'ar-tach-Shast of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years שְׁתֵּ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֑ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh; ten אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni my וְאַחַ֔י <S%H251><s%> ve-'a-Chai, I and my brethren לֶ֥חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem the bread הַפֶּ֖חָה <S%H6346><s%> hap-Pe-chah of the governor לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo neither אָכַֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H398><s%> 'a-Chal-ti. have not eaten
